author: gstein
msg: We no longer want to talk about a "tree delta" as a first-order concept.
Experience shows there is coupling between driver/receiver, such that a
tree delta is not an independent entity. The v2 interface is a
prototypical pattern for describing a set of changes to edit a *known*
target tree into a desired state. There will always be an underlying
coupling, but the editor interface helps to establish a calling pattern
and semantics which can be carried across these various pairings.
* subversion/include/svn_editor.h:
(...): in the docstrings, remove the "producer", "consumer", and the
"tree delta" concepts. Only talk about series of operations between a
driver and a receiver. Add some more history to place this interface.

author: rhuijben
msg: * dev/notes/wc-ng-design: Remove reference to svn cleanup for upgrade

author: rhuijben
msg: Minor followup on r39213, renaming arguments. No functional change.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(send_status_structure, is_external_path, send_unversioned_item,
get_dir_status, handle_dir_entry, handle_externals, get_dir_status):
Following up on 39213, rename eb arguments to walk_status_batons to wb.

author: rhuijben
msg: Make it possible to walk the status of a working copy without creating
the status editor.
Split the edit_baton into a walk_status_baton with only the working copy
requirements and an edit_baton with the rest of the information.
[[ This commit contains an accidental change to the svn_wc_get_pristine_contents
prototype which will be fixed later today. ]]
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h
(svn_wc_walk_status): New function.
(svn_wc_get_pristine_contents2): New prototype without implementation.
(svn_wc_get_pristine_contents): Accidental deprecation.
* subversion/libsvn_client/status.c
(svn_client_status5): Only create an editor if looking at remote status.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/revision_status.c
(svn_wc_revision_status2): Use svn_wc_walk_status() instead of creating
an editor.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/status.c
(walk_status_baton): New structure.
(edit_baton): Add wc_ctx and walk_status batons and remove the values
now available in the walk_status_baton.
(send_status_structure, is_external_path, send_unversioned_item,
get_dir_status, handle_dir_entry, handle_externals, get_dir_status):
Use a walk_status_baton instead of an edit_baton.
(make_dir_baton, handle_statii, close_directory, close_file):
Pass only the walk_status_baton.
(close_edit): Call svn_wc_walk_status when the editor drive didn't
walk the tree.
(svn_wc_get_status_editor5): Fill both batons; use
svn_wc_get_default_ignores instead of duplicating code.
(svn_wc_walk_status): New function, based on the code removed from
close_edit.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/wc-metadata.sql
(BASE_NODE:checksum): Add note on relation to PRISTINE table.
(PRISTINE): Ask more information. Need a MD5 alternative column?
